attributes.action: Against a blanket 50 MPH speed limit on single carriage ways in Scotland
attributes.additional_details: A better idea to reduce accidents would be to introducing a every five year highway code test that you should be able to pass with 95% mark, or take new driving lessons and test. Because observations show that the majority of drivers don't know it. This could be self funding.  This wish for a reduction in speed is clearly promoted by the non or incapable drivers and cyclist's the most of which don't obey the rules anyway.
attributes.background: and us the saved money to continue the A9 up grade

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

https://www.parliament.scot/get-involved/petitions
